title: Mind Body Connection | Chiropractor in Tavares, FL | Buehler Family Chiropractic
description: Mind Body Connection in Tavares, FL. Buehler Family Chiropractic is your local Chiropractor in Tavares serving all of your needs. Call us today at 352-483-7525 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: Whether we're driving a car, riding a bike, or trying to record a spare at our local bowling alley, our musculoskeletal system bases its decision-making on past history, that is, what it has learned before.
